name: 3D Paraglider
description: Do you dream of flying without restrictions, getting as close as possible to mother nature? If yes, then 3D Paraglider is for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD 4000 equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 980 equivelant Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
